Member Function Documentation

static tx_oop_Color_Converter::hslToHsv ( $  H,
$  S,
$  L,
$  round = true 
) [static]

Converts HSL color values into HSV.

This method takes HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values and converts them into HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values.

Parameters:
number The hue value (0-360)
number The saturation value (0-100)
number The luminance value (0-100)
boolean Round final values
Returns:
array An array with HSV color values

static tx_oop_Color_Converter::hslToRgb ( $  H,
$  S,
$  L,
$  round = true 
) [static]

Converts HSL color values into RGB.

This method takes HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values and converts them into RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values. This is the reverse method of rgbToHsl().

Parameters:
number The hue value (0-360)
number The saturation value (0-100)
number The luminance value (0-100)
boolean Round final values
Returns:
array An array with RGB color values

static tx_oop_Color_Converter::rgbToHsl ( $  R,
$  G,
$  B,
$  round = true 
) [static]

Converts RGB color values into HSL.

This method takes RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values and converts them into HSL (Hue-Saturation-Luminance) color values. RGB values are from 0 to 255, and HSL values are returned in an array with associative keys. Note that the returned hue value is an angle (0-360), and the saturation and luminance are percentage (0-100).

Parameters:
number The red value (0-255)
number The green value (0-255)
number The blue value (0-255)
boolean Round final values
Returns:
array An array with HSL color values

static tx_oop_Color_Converter::rgbToHsv ( $  R,
$  G,
$  B,
$  round = true 
) [static]

Converts RGB color values into HSV.

This method takes RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color values and converts them into HSV (Hue-Saturation-Value) color values. RGB values are from 0 to 255, and HSV values are returned in an array with associative keys. Note that the returned hue value is an angle (0-360), and the saturation and value are percentage (0-100).

Parameters:
number The red value (0-255)
number The green value (0-255)
number The blue value (0-255)
boolean Round final values
Returns:
array An array with HSV color values
